column2: Did you ever go on combat patrols or have other dangerous duty?
column3: Were you ever under enemy fire?
column4: Were you ever surrounded by the enemy?
column5: What percentage of the soldiers in your unit were killed (KIA), wounded or missing in action (MIA)?
column6: How often did you fire rounds at the enemy?
column7: How often did you see someone hit by incoming or outgoing rounds?
column8: How often were you in danger of being injured or killed (i.e., being pinned down, overrun, ambushed, near miss, etc.)?
